actions.text: On agreeing to the Moran amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment provides that $7.5 million of the funds made available to the Office of the Director of the National Institutes of Health (NIH) shall be made available for the Office of Alternative Medicine.
purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 95 in the Congressional Record of August 1, to earmark $1.9 million of the $261 million in funds appropriated in the bill for for the Office of the Director of the National Institute of Health, to be used for the Office of Alternative Medicine.
